source.386e9c07:
def missing_percent (Train):
    nan_percent= (Train.isnull().sum()/len (Train))*100
    nan_percent= nan_percent[nan_percent>0].sort_values()
    return nan_percent

plt.xticks(rotation=90)

Train[Bsmt_str_cols]= Train[Bsmt_str_cols].fillna('None')
